subject: Re: Simsonn Collaboration Invitation: Review the Simsonn Plus X Pedals
description_text:
Hello, thanks for interesting in getting reviewt at my YouTube channel. I can offer a review in exchange of a one time fee of Euro 490,- and the pedals has to be sent free of charge. The payment has to be transfered the day before I upload the review via Paypal. I would be happy starting a collaboration. Greetings, Ron. Ron Reviewt Media Content Creation Simracing Testcenter Promotion and Events https://ron-reviewt.jimdosite.com/ https://youtube.com/c/RONreviewt https://www.paypal.me/Ronreviewt?locale.x=de_AT Am 05.09.25 um 03:47 schrieb General and sales enquiries
 
 
 
 
 Von: "General and sales enquiries" <service@simsonn.com> Datum: 5. September 2025 An: "ronreviewt" <ronreviewt@gmx.at> Cc: Betreff: Simsonn Collaboration Invitation: Review the Simsonn Plus X Pedals
 
 
 
 Hello, 
 
 I’m the Product Manager at Simsonn. We’ve seen your objective and impressive reviews of various sim racing equipment on YouTube, and we were very impressed. 
 
 The influence of the Simsonn brand is growing rapidly, and our potential customers are eager to see more authentic feedback from professional sim racers. We believe that your review would not only help us promote our products more effectively, but also bring you greater audience engagement and revenue opportunities. This could be a meaningful collaboration for both of us. 
 
 We would like to sincerely invite you to review our latest product, the Simsonn Plus X Pedals. If you are interested, we will be happy to provide the product to you free of charge. You can choose the model you prefer and create a detailed and objective review video. 
 Here’s the product link: https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-plus-x-pedals 
 
 In addition, through our affiliate program you can earn 8% commission (up to 15%) on sales generated via your content. Please see the details here: 
 http://simsonn.com/pages/affiliate-program 
 
 Thank you for taking the time to consider our collaboration offer. We have full confidence in your professionalism and are looking forward to your reply. If you are interested, we would be glad to discuss the next steps with you. 
 
 Best regards, 
 The Simsonn Team 
 
 
 
 service@simsonn.com
